definition: pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
Cantabrian mountain range in north Spain dividing Asturias from Castilla-Leon
pinyin: Kan3 ta3 bu4 lian2 shan1 mai4
